Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Major
b) Defect Observed: Excessive vibration in control linkage. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Design limitation in component load capacity under extreme conditions
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Flight Control component. Analysis of
operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Conduct fleet-wide inspection campaign
d) Attributable Code: D - Due to features inherent in the design
Remarks: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions.
Date: 18/08/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel
